tally.description: MCP server providing tools to interact with Tally.so API (users, workspaces, forms, submissions, webhooks).

tools.name: TALLY_GET_USER_INFO
tools.description: Get info about the authenticated user

tools.name: TALLY_GET_WORKSPACE
tools.description: Get info about a workspace by ID

parameters.workspaceId: string - The ID of the workspace to retrieve

tools.name: TALLY_UPDATE_WORKSPACE
tools.description: Update workspace details such as name

parameters.workspaceId: string - The ID of the workspace to update
parameters.name: string - New name for the workspace

tools.name: TALLY_LIST_FORMS
tools.description: List all forms, optionally filtered by workspace

parameters.limit: number (optional) - Maximum number of forms per page (default: 50, max: 500)
parameters.workspaceId: string (optional) - Workspace ID to filter forms

tools.name: TALLY_GET_FORM
tools.description: Get details of a specific form by ID

parameters.formId: string - The ID of the form to retrieve

tools.name: TALLY_CREATE_FORM
tools.description: Create a new form with specified status, blocks, and optional settings

parameters.status: string - The status of the form (e.g., 'DRAFT', 'PUBLISHED')
parameters.blocks: array - List of blocks defining the form structure
parameters.workspaceId: string (optional) - Workspace ID to create the form in
parameters.templateId: string (optional) - Template ID to base the form on

tools.name: TALLY_UPDATE_FORM
tools.description: Update an existing form's name, status, blocks, or settings

parameters.formId: string - The ID of the form to update
parameters.name: string (optional) - New name for the form
parameters.status: string (optional) - New status for the form
parameters.blocks: array (optional) - Updated list of blocks for the form

tools.name: TALLY_DELETE_FORM
tools.description: Delete a specific form by ID

parameters.formId: string - The ID of the form to delete

tools.name: TALLY_LIST_FORM_QUESTIONS
tools.description: List all questions for a specific form

parameters.formId: string - The ID of the form to retrieve questions from

tools.name: TALLY_LIST_SUBMISSIONS
tools.description: List all submissions for a form, with optional filters

parameters.formId: string - The ID of the form
parameters.afterId: string (optional) - Retrieve submissions after a specific ID

tools.name: TALLY_GET_SUBMISSION
tools.description: Get details of a specific submission by ID

parameters.formId: string - The ID of the form
parameters.submissionId: string - The ID of the submission

tools.name: TALLY_DELETE_SUBMISSION
tools.description: Delete a specific submission by ID

parameters.formId: string - The ID of the form
parameters.submissionId: string - The ID of the submission

tools.name: TALLY_GET_FORM_SETTINGS
tools.description: Get the settings of a specific form

parameters.formId: string - The ID of the form

tools.name: TALLY_LIST_WEBHOOKS
tools.description: List all webhooks, with optional pagination

parameters.limit: number (optional) - Number of webhooks per page (default: 25, max: 100)

tools.name: TALLY_CREATE_WEBHOOK
tools.description: Create a webhook for a form with specified URL and events

parameters.formId: string - The ID of the form
parameters.signingSecret: string (optional) - Secret for signing webhook payloads
parameters.httpHeaders: array (optional) - List of headers to include

parameters.webhookId: string - The ID of the webhook
parameters.formId: string - The ID of the form
parameters.isEnabled: boolean (optional) - Enable or disable webhook (default: True)
parameters.httpHeaders: array (optional) - List of headers to include

tools.name: TALLY_DELETE_WEBHOOK
tools.description: Delete a specific webhook by ID

parameters.webhookId: string - The ID of the webhook

tools.name: TALLY_LIST_WEBHOOK_EVENTS
tools.description: List all events for a specific webhook

parameters.webhookId: string - The ID of the webhook
